CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1963, p. 15, reads: "The 1963 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama. Pittsburgh's only home and food show, opened before a huge throng last Thursday, June 6, at the spacious Syria Mosque in Oakland...  8. Cooking Demonstrator Sylvia Bernhart of WAMO and her assistant..."
TitMainTitle: Two women, including Sylvia Bernhart speaking into microphone, conducting cooking demonstration on stage, with Natural Gas Companies appliance display, at 1963 Pittsburgh Courier - WAMO, Home-A-Rama fair, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Food industry and trade--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
